reviewText: This system of Kung-fu is based on Tai-chi-Chuan ("The Grand Ultimate Martial Art").  It uses the body in a fluid way and uses internal energy.  In this DVD, the types of punches are taught and this includes how to generate great power using internal energy.  The basic principles of any internal martial art are discussed and demonstrated.  There is a follow up DVD of "Sparring Strategies" in which the teacher shows how these punches are used in fighting situations.  This DVD dispels many myths about how to generate power.
